law_text: Drivers must exercise due care to avoid colliding with an authorized emergency vehicle... by moving from the lane adjacent to the shoulder or slowing down.
preventive_tip: If you see flashing lights on the shoulder, move left or slow down immediately.
rule_summary: Must change lanes or slow down significantly for stopped emergency vehicles.

law_text: No person shall operate a motor vehicle while using any portable electronic device while such vehicle is in motion.
preventive_tip: NY is strict on points for texting (5 points). Do not touch the phone.
rule_summary: Strict prohibition on using devices for data/texting while moving.

law_text: The driver of a vehicle shall stop before reaching the school bus when... a red visual signal is in operation.
preventive_tip: Stop for red flashing bus lights from either direction (unless divided highway).
rule_summary: Illegal to pass a stopped school bus displaying red lights.
